sentences.en: All he wanted was a jug of beer.
sentences.cn: 他所要的只是一罐啤酒.

sentences.en: He poured the coffee out of the saucepan into the jug.
sentences.cn: 他把咖啡从深平底锅倒入壶中.

sentences.en: I managed to grab hold of the jug before it fell.
sentences.cn: 我设法抓住了那个罐子才未跌落.

sentences.en: I was holding a jug while Annie pumped.
sentences.cn: 我提着一把水壶,安妮在抽水.

sentences.en: It is something between a jug and a vase.
sentences.cn: 这东西既象瓦罐又象花瓶.

sentences.en: Jim sucked and sucked at the jug.
sentences.cn: 吉姆对着酒瓶子呷了又呷.

sentences.en: Pour the milk into a jug.
She filled the jug with fresh water.
The hoodlum is still in jug.
The jug slipped to the ground.
Though he sampled the jug you could see he couldn't taste it.
sentences.cn: 尽管他勉强尝了尝瓶里的酒,你可以看出,他尝不出是什么滋味.

trans.tran_cn: n.大罐，壶，一大罐（壶）的容量
trans.tran_en: a deep round container with a very narrow opening at the top and a handle, used for holding liquids

trans.tran_cn: 用陶罐等炖 in an earthenware vessel)； 关押(to jail; imprison)
